name: Ladakh Tour – Hemis festival and Kalachakra (3rd – 13th July 2014)
description:
Join this rare Delhi to Ladakh jeep safari with Roads Less Travelled which takes you to the heart of Buddhist Ladakh at the famous Hemis Monastery Festival and Kalachakra. This Ladakh Tour traverses one of the most beautiful roads on earth (the Manali-Leh highway), crosses the highest motorable roads on earth (Khardung La), and makes u camp right beside the Pangong Lake. Life indeed is a festival to celebrate… !!!
Places Covered: Manali, Jispa, Leh, Pangong Tso, Nubra Valley, Hemis Festival, Kalachakrad
